body_html: Since you are using a generator, you could pass the network instance to the init method and do your evaluations directly in the __getitem__ method, or just update a field of your generator with the dict you need to find the negative margin.
body_text: Since you are using a generator, you could pass the network instance to the init method and do your evaluations directly in the __getitem__ method, or just update a field of your generator with the dict you need to find the negative margin.
body: Since you are using a generator, you could pass the network instance to the init method and do your evaluations directly in the ```__getitem__``` method, or just update a field of your generator with the dict you need to find the negative margin.
